import React from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import StepsView from './StepsView'; import '../styles/Common.css'; import '../styles/Challenge.css'; const Challenge = (props) => { // const {bgcolor} = props const bgcolor = '#8cc251'; return(

Challenge Name

Android powers devices that are beautiful and available in many shapes and sizes. Unlock new functionality for each of your devices with the Android Device service. This service requires the IFTTT app for Android.

 ) } export default Challenge;
